Uses of Package
io.permazen.kv.mvcc

Packages that use io.permazen.kv.mvcc
Package
Description
io.permazen.cli.config
Classes for parsing command line flags in order to configure a Permazen command line interface (CLI) session.
io.permazen.kv
byte[] array key/value store API and related utility classes.
io.permazen.kv.array
A simple KVStore implementation based on a sorted array of key/value pairs.
io.permazen.kv.bdb
KVDatabase implementation based on Oracle's Berkeley DB Java Edition.
io.permazen.kv.caching
Caching KVStore and KVDatabase layers.
io.permazen.kv.fdb
KVDatabase implementation based on FoundationDB.
io.permazen.kv.leveldb
KVDatabase implementation based on LevelDB.
io.permazen.kv.lmdb
KVDatabase implementation based on LMDB.
io.permazen.kv.mvcc
Utility classes for MVCC type operations using a KVStore.
io.permazen.kv.mvstore
AtomicKVStore and KVDatabase implementations based on H2 MVStore.
io.permazen.kv.raft
A distributed KVDatabase based on the Raft consensus algorithm.
io.permazen.kv.simple
A simple in-memory implementation of the KVDatabase interface.
io.permazen.kv.spanner
KVDatabase implementation based on Google Cloud Spanner.
io.permazen.kv.sql
KVDatabase implementations based on SQL connections.
io.permazen.kv.sqlite
KVDatabase implementation based on SQLite.
io.permazen.kv.test
Permazen key/value unit test support classes.
io.permazen.kv.util
Utility classes relating to the KVDatabase interface.
io.permazen.kv.xodus
KVDatabase implementation based on Xodus.
  • Classes in io.permazen.kv.mvcc used by io.permazen.cli.config
    Class
    Description
    AtomicKVStore
    Extension of the KVStore interface for implementations that support atomic, batched reads and writes.
  • Classes in io.permazen.kv.mvcc used by io.permazen.kv
    Class
    Description
    AtomicKVStore
    Extension of the KVStore interface for implementations that support atomic, batched reads and writes.
    Mutations
    Represents a set of mutations that can be applied to a KVStore.
  • Classes in io.permazen.kv.mvcc used by io.permazen.kv.array
    Class
    Description
    AtomicKVStore
    Extension of the KVStore interface for implementations that support atomic, batched reads and writes.
    MutableView
    Straightforward implementation of the DeltaKVStore interface.
    Mutations
    Represents a set of mutations that can be applied to a KVStore.
    SnapshotKVDatabase
    KVDatabase implementation based on an underlying AtomicKVStore using snapshot views and optimistic locking to provide concurrent transactions and linearizable ACID consistency.
    SnapshotKVTransaction
    SnapshotKVDatabase transaction.

  • Classes in io.permazen.kv.mvcc used by io.permazen.kv.mvcc
    Class
    Description
    AtomicKVStore
    Extension of the KVStore interface for implementations that support atomic, batched reads and writes.
    Conflict
    Represents an MVCC conflict.
    DeltaKVStore
    Presents a mutable view of an underlying read-only KVStore and records the mutations in memory.
    MutableView
    Straightforward implementation of the DeltaKVStore interface.
    Mutations
    Represents a set of mutations that can be applied to a KVStore.
    Reads
    Holds a set of reads from a KVStore.
    SnapshotKVDatabase
    KVDatabase implementation based on an underlying AtomicKVStore using snapshot views and optimistic locking to provide concurrent transactions and linearizable ACID consistency.
    SnapshotKVTransaction
    SnapshotKVDatabase transaction.
    TransactionConflictException
    Exception thrown when a transaction fails because of an MVCC conflict.
    Writes
    Holds a set of writes to a KVStore.
